summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Plat 13E page 58 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone the westerly 84 feet of the property located at 1416 North 45th Street from Lowrise 3/Residential Commercial (L-3/RC) to Neighborhood Commercial 2/40' (NC 2/40'\>) and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith (Petition of Chevron USA, Inc.,, c/o Bruce Creager C.F. 297702).
